headline: Equity Residential Named to Dow Jones Sustainability Indices
summary: CHICAGO, December 23, 2024--Equity Residential (NYSE: EQR), a recognized leader in corporate responsibility, today announced that the Company was named to both the Dow Jones Sustainability World and North America Indices. Equity Residential is the first residential REIT to receive this distinction and one of only four U.S. REITs to be included in both indices. The indices comprise global sustainability leaders identified by S&P Global through its Corporate Sustainability Assessment and only the
